Trade/Device Name(s): illumigene Mycoplasma Direct DNA Amplification Assay
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Specimen Container(s): Transport medium on pledget: Liquid Amies without charcoal
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene Mycoplasma Direct DNA Amplification Assay using LAMP for qualitative detection of Mycoplasma pneumoniae DNA in throat swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the diagnosis of Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection by direct qualitative detection of DNA from throat swabs in patients suspected of infection; intended as an aid to diagnosis used alongside other clinical and laboratory findings
